def.dt: :a person who buys goods and services Many consumers are still not comfortable making purchases on the Internet. often used before another noun Consumer spending is increasing. consumer services consumer demands/preferences
:products that people buy for personal use or for use at home a range of consumer goods, from clothing to cameras to food
:a list of prices of goods and services that shows how much prices have changed in a given period of time abbr. CPI called also (Brit) retail price index
